bio: Mindless husks who wander Zombie Night in search of delectable brains. They are most common in BBQ, so bring your largest mallets!

soultimate.name: Zombify
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Defense by 24% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' defense for a time.

skill.effect: Recovers all HP once when defeated.
skill.name: Reincarnate

name: Zombie
